short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let your tab filled with a Thirukural. Life changing Kural now and then.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A dark themed, minimalist replacement for Chrome's New Tab page.
This extension replaces Chrome's New Tab page with a dark and minimalist version which shows a couplets of Thirukkural ( a famous Tamil classic book) and its explanation. 

In a single click, you can copy Thirukkural or explanation.

To recover the default New Tab page, simply remove the extension.
